channel.title: Robotics on Refresh Annapolis Valley
channel.description: Recent content in Robotics on Refresh Annapolis Valley

item.title: Margaret Hopkins
item.description: Margaret Hopkins is a third year math and music major at Acadia University with an interest in promoting mathematics and technology education for youth in the Annapolis Valley. She is a founding member and now coach of the Horton High Robats, an all-girls' robotics team; coaches Wolfville School’s First Lego League team, Robo Lobo Wired; and volunteers with WISE Acadia and other organizations in the region to promote STEM education for all students.
